<style type="text/css">

/* CSS Adjustments */

.white-center  {
  text-align: center;
  color: #fff;
}

.white-center a {
  color: #fff;
}

.white-center a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.ensure-height {
  color: #fff;
  height: 3em;
}

.sml {
  font-size: 85%;
}

</style>
